data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh God! What now??... hang on...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: What's with all these Teddies? How did we even get here... again?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Have we been here before, Lev?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: I certainly haven't! You know this place?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I know this... How... How do I know this?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: There has to be a clue... around... *cough* around here...
